name: Dialog.Root

preventScroll.description: Whether or not to prevent scroll on the body when the dialog is open.
preventScroll.description_zh: Whether or not to prevent scroll on the body when the dialog is open.

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the dialog when the escape key is pressed.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: Whether to close the dialog when the escape key is pressed.

closeOnOutsideClick.description: Whether to close the dialog when a click occurs outside of it.
closeOnOutsideClick.description_zh: Whether to close the dialog when a click occurs outside of it.

open.description: Whether or not the dialog is open.
open.description_zh: Whether or not the dialog is open.

onOpenChange.description: A callback function called when the open state changes.
onOpenChange.description_zh: A callback function called when the open state changes.

openFocus.description: Override the initial focus when the dialog is opened.
openFocus.description_zh: Override the initial focus when the dialog is opened.

closeFocus.description: Override the focus when the dialog is closed.
closeFocus.description_zh: Override the focus when the dialog is closed.

portal.description: Where to render the dialog when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null
portal.description_zh: Where to render the dialog when it is open. Defaults to the body. Can be disabled by passing null

onOutsideClick.description: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.
onOutsideClick.description_zh: A callback function called when a click occurs outside of the element. If event.preventDefault() is called, the default behavior of closing the element will be prevented.

description: The root component used to set and manage the state of the dialog.

slots.name: ids
slots.description: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
slots.description_zh: The ids of the elements within the component, useful when you don't necessarily want to provide a custom ID, but still want access to the ID being assigned (if any).
